jobDescription: This part-time internship will provide you with an excellent opportunity to learn the basics of qualified retirement plans. We are flexible and accommodating with college student’s schedules. Position can lead to full-time internship and/or employment. JOB DESCRIPTION:Reconcile pension trust accountingReview and log employer census dataPrepare IRS forms and related schedulesReview plan documentsSupport Administrators with administrative tasks as neededJOB REQUIREMENTS:Interest in Actuarial Science, Mathematics, Business/Finance, Accounting, Economics or a related field
